00054 template <typename T1, typename T2> struct SAME_TYPE{enum {RESULT = 0};};
00055 template <typename T1> struct SAME_TYPE<T1,T1>{enum {RESULT = 1};};
00056 
00060 template<typename T1, typename T2> inline bool sameType(T1 var1, T2 var2)
00061 {return SAME_TYPE<T1, T2>::RESULT;}
00062 template<typename T1, typename T2> inline bool sameType()
00063 {return SAME_TYPE<T1, T2>::RESULT;}
